Status Quo: I am aware of the kinds of data collected by my Smart Home device.
Status Quo: Smart Home device data has monetary value.
Status Quo: Smart Home device data is collected by companies.
Status Quo: Smart Home device data is gathered regularly by a Smart Home device.

Status Quo: Smart Home device data is stored remotely.

Awareness: I am aware that my Smart Home device data is analyzed to know about my preferences and practices.
Awareness: I am aware of the parties who analyze my Smart Home device data.
